SEARCH

Class Motherboard

java.lang.Object
Motherboard
public class Motherboard extends Object
Represents a Motherboard which will have Devices connected to it and Applications on those Devices.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    Motherboard()
    creates a new Motherboard with no connected devices

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected boolean
    addDevice(Device device)
    Adds the given Device to this Motherboard.
    protected Map<Integer,Device>
    devices()
    Returns an unmodifiable copy of the mapping of identifier to Device for this Motherboard.

    Returns whether this Motherboard has a Device with the given identifier.
    protected boolean
    removeDevice(int identifier)
    Removes the Device with the given identifier from this Motherboard.
    protected boolean
    sendBroadcastMessage(String payload)
    Sends the given broadcast message to all Devices connected to this Motherboard that wants to receive broadcast messages.

    sendMessage(Message message)
    Sends the given Message to the Message's recipient if they are connected to this motherboard.

  • Constructor Details

    • Motherboard

      protected Motherboard()
      creates a new Motherboard with no connected devices

  • Method Details

    • addDevice

      protected boolean addDevice(Device device)
      Adds the given Device to this Motherboard. Returns if the given Device was successfully added.
      Parameters:
      device - the Device to be added
      Returns:
      whether this Motherboard already has a Device with the identifier, and if not, "connects" with it
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the given Device is null Adds to devices if successful

    • removeDevice

      protected boolean removeDevice(int identifier)
      Removes the Device with the given identifier from this Motherboard. Returns if a Device was removed from this Motherboard or not.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the unique identifier of the Device to be removed
      Returns:
      whether the Device was successfully removed from this Motherboard Removes from devices if successful

    • devices

      protected Map<Integer,Device> devices()
      Returns an unmodifiable copy of the mapping of identifier to Device for this Motherboard.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable copy of the devices this Motherboard is connected to

    • hasDeviceWithID

      protected boolean hasDeviceWithID(int identifier)
      Returns whether this Motherboard has a Device with the given identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - unique identifier of a Device
      Returns:
      whether this Motherboard already has a Device with the given identifier

    • sendMessage

      protected boolean sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends the given Message to the Message's recipient if they are connected to this motherboard. Returns whether the Message was successfully sent.
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to be sent
      Returns:
      whether this Motherboard is connected to a Device with identifier matching the Message's recipient
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the Device is null Logs a warning and returns false when no Device with the Message's ID is connected to this Motherboard Calls device.receiveMessage(message)

    • sendBroadcastMessage

      protected boolean sendBroadcastMessage(String payload)
      Sends the given broadcast message to all Devices connected to this Motherboard that wants to receive broadcast messages. Returns whether any Device received the broadcast message.
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload to broadcast
      Returns:
      whether any Device received the broadcast message
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the payload is null Logs a warning message and returns false if the payload is not binary Calls device.receiveBroadcast() Calls device.receiveBroadcastMessage(payload)
